com.esotericsoftware.kryo

Class Registration

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.esotericsoftware.kryo.Registration

  • public class Registration
extends java.lang.Object
    Describes the Serializer and class ID to use for a class.
    Author:
    Nathan Sweet
